description:
get_info raises Exception rather than NotFound. This is not caught by _update_state in compute/manager and causes a traceback. By raising a NotFound exception, the XenAPI's behaviour is consistent with libvirt's

I am at revision 453 of trunk.
title: xenapi raise Exception rather than NotFound in get_info

comments.content:
get_info raises Exception rather than NotFound. This is not caught by _update_state in compute/manager and causes a traceback. By raising NotFound XenAPI behaviour is consistent with libvirt

I am at revision 453 of trunk.
